text: aur jin logon ne bure kaam kie hain to gunaah kee saza usake baraabar hai aur un par rusavaee chhaee hogee khuda (ke azaab) se unaka koee bachaane vaala na hoga (unake muh aise kaale honge) goya unake chehare yabon yazoor (andheree raat) ke tukade se dhak die gae hain yahee log jahannumee hain ki ye usamen hamesha rahenge
